Title: An Act Converting the Isabela High School in the Municipality of Ilagan, Province of Isabela, into a National High School to be Known as Isabela National High School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 144
An Act Converting the Isabela High School in the Municipality of Ilagan, Province of Isabela, into a National High School to be Known as Isabela National High School
Section 1. The Isabela high School in the Municipality of Ilagan, Province of Isabela, is hereby converted into a national high school to be known as the Isabela National High School.
Section 2. The Ministry of Education and Culture shall take the necessary steps for the immediate implementation of this Act.1awp++i1
Section 3. The amount of two hundred thousand pesos for the operation of the school shall be charged to the appropriations authorized by Batas Pambansa Blg. 80 for the Ministry of Education and Culture intended for new national schools.
Section 4. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: February 8, 1982
